text: ai eemaanadaaron jab tum khuda kee raah mein (jehaad karane ko) safar karo to (kisee ke qatl karane mein jaldee na karo balki) achchhee tarah joch kar liya karo aur jo shakhs (izahaare islaam kee garaz se) tumhe salaam kare to tum be soche samajhe na kah diya karo ki too eemaanadaar nahin hai (isase zaahir hota hai) ki tum (fakt) duniyaavee aasaish kee tamanna rakhate ho magar isee bahaane qatl karake loot lo aur ye nahin samajhate ki (agar yahee hai) to khuda ke yaho bahut se ganeematen hain (musalamaanon) pahale tum khud bhee to aise hee the phir khuda ne tumapar ehasaan kiya (ki bekhatake musalamaan ho gae) garaz khoob chhaanabeen kar liya karo beshak khuda tumhaare har kaam se khabaradaar hai
